short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides AI-powered explanations in the side panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select something in your Chrome browser and use right-click to see the explanation of the selected phrase. Enjoy the ease of ChatGPT even better.

Cheers, Jap and Piet

Note: This is still the Beta version. Any feedback would be highly appreciated and can be submitted via the following link: https://sites.google.com/view/chatgptx/
